title: raritycheck
author: raritycheck
content: looking for details on some coins

comments.author: raritycheck
comments.body: 1st coin:https://auctions.stacksbowers.com/lots/view/3-1606MC/2022-1hodlclub-silver-poker-chip-00021-bitcoin-loaded-firstbits-1clubx9f-serial-no-15-struck-in-12oz-999-fine-silver-ms-69-plyear:2022 mintage   : 33?details.body   : silver?details.metal_value.weight(grams): 1/2 Ozdetails.weight   :??details.thickness :    ??details.diameter   : ??details.value.denomination   : 0.021details.metal_value.metal: silver Plus all 33 addresses please help!

comments.author: Mitchell
comments.body: The 1/2 oz coins were gifts for people that bought the 1HoDLCLUB 1oz Fine Gold 999.9 GENESIS coin.Quote from: MrCryptHodl on September 01, 2022, 03:40:02 PM[...]And covered by myself will be delivered to you a 0.5 troy ounce pure Silver coin [0.5 troy ounce to fit the same diameter as the 1oz Fine Gold 999.9 coin], with the same design as the Gold coin, loaded with 0.0021 BTC with the same serial number as your Gold coin, this coin will also be delivered with its box and COA, these coins will be a gift from me, there will be no more than the number of gold coins minted, and will never be sold separately by the 1HoDLCLUB.![...]You can see a picture of the coins and the pouch right here (thanks Cygan). The only thing I couldn't find is the addresses of the silver coins. As far as I can see, only the addresses for the gold coins were shared in the OP.Hope this helps!

The only thing I couldn't find is the addresses of the silver coins. As far as I can see, only the addresses for the gold coins were shared in the OP.Hope this helps!Thank you.. if any one has then .. looking for addresses for this

comments.author: cygan
comments.body: Quote from: Mitchell on October 25, 2023, 09:29:11 PMThe 1/2 oz coins were gifts for people that bought the 1HoDLCLUB 1oz Fine Gold 999.9 GENESIS coin.✂that was indeed the case. and each silver coin given away also had the same serial as the gold coins purchased.and if i compare the serial (#15) of the silver coin posted by raritycheck with the sale list of the gold coins so the coin offered for auction on stacksbowers should belong to 2stout value denomination for the silver ones is 0.0021 and not 0.021. 0.0021 is only for the gold coins

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: someone should tell them... they have it listed as ".021 BTC" in the "Lot Description" but then have it correctly stated as .0021 BTC in the title. One is right and one is wrong.
